channel.title: Comments on: Complete Hotkeys Guide For Age Of Empires 2 Definitive
channel.description: Learn and Play Age Of Empires 2 Just Better

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/complete-hotkeys-guide-for-age-of-empires-2-definitive/#comment-495">Emmanuel Goldstein</a>.
Totally true! You should do better mechanically and in fights.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Emmanuel Goldstein.

Totally true! You should do better mechanically and in fights.

item.title: By: Emmanuel Goldstein
item.dc:creator: Emmanuel Goldstein
item.description: All of these years playing dota will come in handy. Thanks for the guide!
item.content:encoded: All of these years playing dota will come in handy. Thanks for the guide!

item.title: By: Mike Dougherty
item.dc:creator: Mike Dougherty
item.description: This link does not work to download. Can I please get a reupload? I just started the game for the first time and I am trying to learn on a template.
item.content:encoded: This link does not work to download. Can I please get a reupload? I just started the game for the first time and I am trying to learn on a template.
